Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Class LogEncoder.Buffer.StringBuilderBuffer

java.lang.Object
io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.Buffer.StringBuilderBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogEncoder.Buffer, AutoCloseable
Enclosing interface:
LogEncoder.Buffer
public static final class LogEncoder.Buffer.StringBuilderBuffer extends Object implements LogEncoder.Buffer
A buffer that simply wraps a StringBuilder. Direct access to the StringBuilder is available as the field stringBuilder.
See Also:

      public void drain(LogOutput output, LogEvent event)
      Description copied from interface: LogEncoder.Buffer
      The appender will call this usually within a lock to transfer content from the buffer to the output.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Description copied from interface: LogEncoder.Buffer
      Prepare the buffer for reuse.

      An appender may not call clear before being passed to the encoder so the encoder should do its own clearing.

      Specified by:
      clear in interface LogEncoder.Buffer
